description:

Punch Monk: is a challenging puzzle game with 50 phases of incremental progression. As players advance, new mechanics are introduced, increasing the game's complexity.

Slime Ranger: You are on a quest to find and defeat the Slime King. With a limited movement, you need to think carefully about every step until you reach the door. Push boxes, find keys, beware of traps, and slay every slime that get in your way!

SokoNature: The game has 50 levels, with increasing difficulty and the introduction of new mechanics as the player progresses. The character can have three distinct sizes: small, medium, and large. The character will grow in size whenever they collect a seed (see collectible items) and shrink one size when they take damage (see board tiles/enemies).

name: Millennium Whisper
description:
It’s 1999 and there is a rumour going around. If two people confess their feelings for one another at the turn of the millennium, they will be destined to be together in a thousand year fairytale romance! Who will choose you on New Year's eve?

Welcome to Escafeld College, the school in which you spend the next year meeting a cast of 13 unique characters. Taking them to a variety of locations and making new friendships along the way!

Building your skills is going to be vital to maintaining your standing at the college and with the cast. A delicate balance that will allow you to grow closer to the people you like. While also keeping you in the good graces of everyone else you meet at Escafeld.

Rather than the standard dry AI experiences trained on large sets of data from the internet, the cast in Millennium Whisper is played by AI that are exclusively trained on in-house creative work and runs entirely on your own hardware!

The possibilities are endless, and the way you play the game will be entirely unique to you. Each of our (13) characters has their own unique personality and behaviours powered by their own separately trained model. In Millennium Whisper you can have complex relationships and deep conversations, or enjoy a more light hearted experience, having fun with the characters.

Play the game your way, and write your own story.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 3: Tiger-Heli
description:
Toaplan produced several landmark 2D Shooting titles in the arcade during the 1980's that today are regarded as some of the earliest and finest examples of the genre. Among those, one title stands out in particular as having established many important ideas that helped define the shooting game genre -- 1985's Tiger-Heli.

You could say that the features which characterize a shooting game today, like the scrolling playfield, screen clearing bombs, weapon upgrade systems, and so on, were probably in some way influenced by one of the titles in this collection.

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 4: Drift Out
description:
VISCO Corporation’s DRIFT OUT series is a celebrated collection of 2D rally racing games that brought the excitement of World Rally Championship Racing to arcades and home consoles. Spanning from the original Drift Out in 1991 to Neo Drift Out: New Technology in 1996, the series was renowned for its innovative use of the isometric perspectives, tight controls, and engaging track designs.

Included in this collection is all four games in the Drift Out series as well as several bonus sports titles from the VISCO Catalogue to enjoy in between races!

name: Maimai DX Plus
description:
An updated version of maimai DX.

General Information / Changes
"Partner" and "Stamp Card" feature added.
- When you first play でらっくす PLUS, you choose one of six stamp cards, featuring the cast of FiNALE; it cannot be changed until it's filled with ten stamps.
- For each day maimai is played, one stamp is awarded, regardless of the amount of credits entered.
- When a card is filled with ten stamps, the corresponding partner can be obtained.
- A partner can be chosen at the collection settings screen or on maimaiDX-NET, like other types of collections.
- The chosen partner replaces Delu-kuma (でらっくま) on the result screen.
- Some system voices also give partners unique voice.

name: Maimai DX Universe Plus
description:
Updated release of maimai DX UNiVERSE.

General Information / Changes:
"Invitation Play" introduced, where another player can play the BASIC difficulty of the song being played on the unused side of the cabinet for free (once per day).
- If both have cleared the song (80% or above), the player who initiated the invitation gets a boost in Area progress as well as a 1.5x Ticket.
- FULL SYNC badges and Collections that require 2 players cannot be obtained in Invitation Play.

2-player mode now awards an extra stamp in Stamp Cards.

When choosing Tour Members in Areas:
- Locking is reintroduced.
- "Auto set" now lets you choose between ascending and descending order of Tour Members' level.

Area progress is now shown on the music select screen, along with the current ticket and DX Pass.

FULL SYNC status is now shown during gameplay.

name: Othello Derby
description: Othello Derby is an Arcade adaptation of Othello/Reversi. The game is represented through horse racing; players choose between a white or black horse, which corresponds to their color in the game of Othello. You have the choice of three difficulties, though they all have the same set of opponents and the Medium and Hard difficulties simply start you off at the 2nd and 3rd opponents. When the race starts, the Othello board pops up and you are pitted against an animated CPU opponent. Defeat them to win the race and advance to the next, harder opponent. You only have 10 seconds to make each of your moves; if you run of out of time, the game places your piece for you.

Polly's soda-lighted you're here.
Just earlier today, a strange gravity anomaly snatched Polly’s favourite can of pop clean out of his webbed fingers, and he needs your help to reclaim his beloved beverage! Use Polly’s signature bubble-jump and tongue-grapple to traverse a low-poly world reminiscent of games from your childhood.
Embark on an un-frog-ettable adventure through 3 challenging levels set to an energetic soundtrack punctuated by humorous narration. This is a Foddian game sure to keep you busy for up to 60 minutes, or until you rage quit, whichever comes first.
So, what are you waiting for?

Explore a city as it shifts and moves over the course of several days.
Find your way into over a dozen unique interiors.
Collect the trinkets of the brooding streets and make yourself an identity.
Talk with several NPCs as they enter and leave the stage.
Discover the city's secrets, maybe even a secret ending if you can.
Sweet dreams.

Welcome to this game that combines visual novel and side-scrolling bullet hell shooter elements.

During the day, you will experience the protagonist's school life from her perspective. At night, you will become a secret operative, piloting the Dreambreaker through various dreamscapes. To find her missing sister, the protagonist, Mu Deng, dives into different dreams every night, searching for the clues her sister left behind. Along the way, she encounters various companions and gradually uncovers the secrets behind her sister's disappearance.

a game made in 3 days for a gamejam, where you control the characters Clover and Claus to go through levels
it's a puzzle game, with the main mechanics being a weapon, used to destroy certain blocks, the cloner of the character Clover

name: SEMP 64
description:
This is a super easy multiplayer platformer, or SEMP for short.
So it's a 3D platformer, with online multiplayer and it's super easy
(Disclaimer: it's actually super difficult and not super easy)

Climb to the very top of the super huge level.
Fall down and... well try again I guess. Maybe you where lucky and able to save yourself onto a near platform. Or you lost hours of progress, who knows what'll happen.

Play alone, join the global lobby or host your own 4 player lobby for your friends.
But let's be real, it's much more fun to see tons of players fall down... I mean climb up the world.

Already mastered the game? Well respect. But what now?
Hop into the level editor and build your own levels! Let's see if you can make players rage quit even faster than I could.

After Solid Snake's tragic death, Jake receives an urgent call from Otacon who informs him of Metal Gears in Out Heaven. Jake Snake decides to continue his father's legacy of destroying Metal Gears and killing bad guys!

2D Standard Commanders start with one open Skill slot and earn Commander XP at the standard rate.

2025 Games Workshop Ltd

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Quick Start
description:
It fires quickly, it moves quickly. If you can't wait to jump into battle, take command of the BT-SV!

This rare World War II light tank is excellent for learning how to play as an active scout. Get it in the Quick Start bundle, and you'll also receive Premium Time to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier III BT-SV Light Tank
- Premium Time - 3 Days
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ready for Combat
description:
He might not need a tank to fight, but he'll make good use of any vehicle he commands. Customize the Major "Butch" Alan Commander with Skills to optimize your tank's performance! The Ready for Combat bundle also gives you Premium Time, Silver, and boosters to prepare you for the battles ahead.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Major "Butch" Alan 3D Hero Commander
- Premium Time - 1 Day
- x8 Commander XP Boosters (10)
- x3 Vehicle XP Boosters (10)
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: Hero Commanders start with three open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +30% bonus rate.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Vipers Starter Pack
description: Get a grip on this DLC bundle packed with Boosters and Premium Account time to help you earn more from every match.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: T-62M-1
description:
"Flexibility" is the name of the game when you command the T-62M-1. This Cold War medium tank features a well-protected turret and mounts an accurate, hard-hitting gun that can fire guided missiles as well as standard rounds. Switch between defense and offense as the battle demands!

Make the T-62M-1 yours with the Tank of the Month bundle. You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• T-62M-1 Escalation Era (Era 2) Eastern Alliance Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: M41D
description: This light tank for World War II mode has the accuracy, view range, and reload time to make you a quick-firing active scout and a key support player on your team.

Take command of the M22 Locust and master the role of the active scout! The high rate of fire on this fast-moving tank will make it nearly impossible for your enemies to escape.

Scout ‘n' Swarm also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

• Patricia Laserian 3D Hero Commander

Make the K-91 Version II yours with the Tank of the Month bundle! You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Make the AltProto AMX 30 yours with the Tank of the Month bundle. You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

description:
It fires quickly, it moves quickly. If you can't wait to jump into battle, take command of the BT-SV!

This rare World War II light tank is excellent for learning how to play as an active scout. Get it in the Quick Start bundle, and you'll also receive Premium Time to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier III BT-SV Light Tank
- Premium Time - 3 Days
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ambush From Afar
description:
When you command the SU-130PM, you command a vehicle built to unleash hell and relocate before the enemy even knows what hit 'em!

Get this punishing World War II tank destroyer in the Ambush From Afar bundle. It comes with the customizable Klimov 3D Commander and 14 days of Premium Time to increase your earnings in every battle.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier VIII SU-130PM Tank Destroyer
- Klimov 3D Premium Commander
- Premium Time - 14 Days

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo. Premium Commanders start with two open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +15% bonus rate.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Master Flanker
description:
Take your battlefield strategy up a level with the nimble, fast-firing Cromwell B. Team up with your wolfpack and head straight for the enemy's most vulnerable points.

Bundle includes:
• British Tier VI Cromwell B Medium Tank
• Jon “Frosty” May 3D Premium Commander
• Premium Time - 3 Days
• (10) x8 Commander XP Boosters
• (10) x3 Vehicle XP Boosters
• (10) x2 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

Path of Exile: Warlord of the Karui Supporter Pack
description: The Warlord of the Karui Supporter Pack contains Early Access to Path of Exile 2, four Armour Sets, four Back Attachments, a Finisher Effect, five Hideout Decorations, eight Weapon Skins, five Pets, a Weapon Effect, a Level-up Effect, a Hideout, a portal Effect, four Portrait Frames, four Forum Titles, four Badges, and 2200 Points.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Dark Angels Chapter Pack
description:
Bear the honoured colours of the Dark Angels with the Dark Angels Chapter Pack!

This DLC contains an exclusive Champion skin for the Bulwark and his shield, three weapon skins, and over 40 cosmetic items from 8 Dark Angels Successor Chapters.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack
description:
Bear the colours of the Ultramarines Successor Chapters with the Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack!

This DLC contains more than 30 cosmetic items and options from 12 Ultramarines chapters.

name: UFL: Foundation
description: Do you want to enter the game fully prepared? Pre-order the UFL Foundation pack now and be the first on the pitch!

description: Do you want to enter the game fully prepared? Pre-order the Ultimate UFL club pack now and be the first on the pitch!

name: UFL: Club
description: Do you want to enter the game fully prepared? Pre-order the UFL club pack now and be the first on the pitch!

name: Train Sim World 5: Avanti West Coast BR Class 390 Pendolino EMU
description: Tilt your way in and out of the capital on the busiest services in the UK. The Class 390 Pendolino swings into action with Train Sim World 5, sporting the teal and tango tones of Avanti West Coast, and racing along the thrilling West Coast Main Line!

name: Train Sim World 5: Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim
description: Go cross-border and shuttle along the rural, hilly backdrops of Europe in Train Sim World 4. Take a trip back to the early 2010s and climb aboard the classic electric BR 111 - tap into Deutsche Bahn regional services between Germany and Austria with Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim!

name: Train Sim World 5: Free Starter Pack
description: Download the Train Sim World 5: Free Starter Pack to get access to the TRAINING CENTER, a tailor-made environment designed to train you up with the fundamentals of loco operations! Try your hand at mastering this introductory experience before discovering your favourite routes.

name: Train Sim World 5: Great Western Express
description: Train Sim World 2: Great Western Express brings to life the experience of driving high speed and commuter passenger trains on one of Britain's busiest railways. Take control of the iconic Great Western Railways HST and command it to 125mph along the Great Western Main Line out of London's Paddington Main Line Station.

name: Train Sim World 5: Brighton Main Line: London Victoria - Brighton
description: Experience one of Britain's busiest main lines, from the nation's Capital to England's oldest coastal destination, via the international hub of Gatwick Airport. Whether Southern commuter or Gatwick Express, a flurry of passengers await in Train Sim World 2: London Commuter.

name: Train Sim World 5: London Overground Suffragette line - Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside
description: An Aventra Adventure awaits in Train Sim World 4! Discover North & East London boroughs aboard modern traction, traversing a newly electrified and extended line fit for future service. Become something of a driver yourself on the Suffragette line: Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside!

name: Train Sim World 5: MBTA Commuter - Boston - Worcester
description: Take charge of passenger traffic in dashing MBTA Purple and run through the commuter suburbs of Central Massachusetts. Operate the sleek HSP46 on the bustling rails out of Boston South and out onto the busy Framingham/Worcester Line in Train Sim World 5!

name: Train Sim World 5: Sherman Hill - Cheyenne - Laramie
description: All the grandeur of big-time, modern American freight railroading comes together on Union Pacific's legendary Sherman Hill for Train Sim World 3! Climb aboard the and potent SD70ACe and veteran SD40-2 diesel locomotives to forward tonnage between Cheyenne and Laramie, now with volumetric skies!

name: Train Sim World 5: Semmeringbahn - Wiener Neustadt - Mürzzuschlag
description: Explore the World's first true mountain railway in Train Sim World 4! Drive trains at altitude through the rocky, forested peaks of the Austrian Alps. Climb the Semmering Pass before hastening downgrade towards historic Wiener Neustadt. Control iconic ÖBB traction on your Semmeringbahn adventure!

name: Train Sim World 5: Schnellfahrstrecke Köln-Aachen
description: Experience the thrill of high-speed inter-city German rail as you push the throttle through bustling German Metropolis and the rolling open countryside in the exquisite Train Sim World 2: Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen.

name: Train Sim World 5: NEC - New York - Trenton
description: Experience the City that never sleeps. From the Big Apple to New Jersey suburbs, non-stop action awaits aboard premier electric traction. Serve the East Coast well with NJ TRANSIT and Amtrak passenger equipment, brought to life in Train Sim World 3: Northeast Corridor: New York - Trenton.

description: Undisputed brings you The Problem Child Pack, featuring Jake ‘El Gallo De Dorado' Paul, as well as six other epic fighters including Zhilei Zhang, Juan Manuel Márquez, Erik Morales, Marco Antonio Barrera, James ‘Buster' Douglas, and Otto Wallin, along with six new sets of ring attire for the current roster.

description: A terrible night to be trapped in Cypress Ridge…

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Special Police Vehicle Pack
description: Extend your department's roster of police vehicles with 9 patrol cars with 5 new skin sets, including black/white, white/blue, black/yellow, and white/gold paint jobs.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Tropical Taskforce Pack
description: The sun is calling, what are you waiting for? The Tropical Taskforce Pack has the perfect outfits for a tropical summer, ensuring you always look great while riding the wave of justice. The pack contains six different, summerly undercover uniforms.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Unmarked Police Vehicle Pack
description: Want to conceal your police identity and go undercover? Add a selection of 9 exclusive unmarked police vehicles with 5 different looks to your fleet.
